again n again am getting the Root CA installation message . not able to proceed further.

Hi Team ,

i have downloaded Jmeter and when i try to run the jmeter am not able to continue my tests bocz of root ca certificate error .

Steps : 
1.clicked on Jmater bacth file in Bin folder
2. trying to create the HTTP(S) test script recorder in jmeter workbeanch
3.on entering all the details and clicked on START
4.received an ROOT CA certificate warning message .
5. i have imported the ROOT CA certificate to the system as well as browser.
6.i closed the application and again try to record the script am getting the same error massage saying please install ROOT CA Certificate. not able to proceed further  .

please do the needful .

Created attachment 33839
we have added the certificate
creator: 2886reddy@gmail.com
support@ubikloadpack.com
text:
The popup you see is not an error, it's just an information.
JMeter does not know about your browser and wether you added or not the certificate.

thanks a lot for the quick reply :)

we have added the certificates , then also its showing the same warning message ?
please find the attached screen shot for the same .
